SEARCH
Package com.data.currency

Class CurrencySettings

java.lang.Object
com.data.currency.CurrencySettings
public class CurrencySettings extends Object
The CurrencySettings class implements the Singleton design pattern to manage user's currency choice. It allows setting and getting selected currency with a default value of "usd" and storing previously chosen currencies.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CurrencySettings getInstance()
      Provides global access to the single instance of CurrencySettings. If the instance does not exist, it creates a new one. Otherwise, it returns the existing instance.
      Returns:
      The single instance of CurrencySettings class.

    • getSelectedCurrency

      public String getSelectedCurrency()
      Retrieves the currently selected currency.
      Returns:
      The currently selected currency string.

    • setSelectedCurrency

      public void setSelectedCurrency(String selectedCurrency)
      Sets the currently selected currency to a new value.
      Parameters:
      selectedCurrency - The new currency string to be set as selected.
